title: Beachfront Sri Lanka Paradise overlooking Pasikuda Bay with Massages, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Experience the serene beauty of Sri Lanka's eastern coast at this luxury beachfront hotel in Pasikuda. Enjoy a three-kilometre stretch of private beach, world-class scuba diving nearby, fine dining and fresh seafood at the signature restaurant, a unique underground spa with skilled Balinese therapists, and exhilarating water sports.

The resort's architectural elegance combines Mediterranean charm with tropical simplicity that makes for the perfect elevated yet laid-back beach escape. Set along the pristine shores of Pasikuda Bay, known for its gentle waves and shallow waters, experience the bliss of wading waist-deep to the coral reef's edge or diving under the waves alongside vibrant marine life.
offer_address: Uga Bay, Coconut Board Road, Pasikuda, Kalkudha, 30410, Sri Lanka

title: Sri Lanka Seaside Serenity with Daily Breakfast, Infinity Pool, Spa & Five Restaurants
description:
Discover the tranquil beauty of Sri Lanka's eastern coast with a stay at this laidback resort and spa overlooking the majestic Indian Ocean from Pasikuda Bay. Enjoy a host of top-tier facilities, including a rejuvenating spa, five dining outlets serving Sri Lankan cuisine in a variety of settings, water sport rentals, a children's play area and a beachfront infinity pool.

When it's time to explore, venture to nearby Batticaloa Lagoon, or take a leisurely stroll along golden Pasikuda Beach. Call it a day in chalets with the best of amenities and generous hospitality.
offer_address: Coconut Development Board Road, Pasikuda 30410, Sri Lanka
